blogPost.excerpt: The "frosted glass" effect has been with us for quite some time with each company having its own name for it. In Nov 2020 Mike Malewicz wrote a medium article trying to unify it under one name. Then we created this handy CSS generator. Enjoy!
blogPost.body: The "frosted glass" effect has been with us for quite some time with each company having its own name for it. In Nov 2020 Mike Malewicz wrote a medium article trying to unify it under one name. Then we created this handy CSS generator. Enjoy!
blogPost.title: Glassmorphism CSS Generator - Generate the CSS for frosted glass effect for free.
blogPost.author: michal malewicz
